intro: Lijndenia semseii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its upright, branching stems and velvety, heart-shaped leaves. Lijndenia semseii is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
